channel.title: FreeFest [F2P][PI] (Soon Updates Daily)
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/FreeFestLogo1.jpg[/img][/center] [center][size=18pt][b]V0.3[/b][/size][/center]
[center][center][size=24pt][u][b]Information[/b][/u][/size][/center] Server Name: FreeFest Type: 317 Base: Luckscape V2(changed because i didn't like hybrid pvp)
This is a F2P only server. It is my first project, so expect a few flaws. I plan on making this different than other F2P servers, with more "fun" features.[/center]
[center][size=24pt][b]Updates[/b][/size][/center] [center]-Disabled all Members Prayers and Edited Client Texts 3/13/11
-Added Npc dialogue, made Entrana home, removed Runescape logo in client, finished F2P training locations 3/14/11
-Fixed altar at Entrana, new things in home, changed shop items to F2P items, changed to V0.2 3/17/11
-Made Donator zone 3/18/11
-All bosses are now working and I added their drops 3/22/11[/center]
[center][b][size=24pt]Media[/size][/b][/center] [center] [IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/FreeFestdisabledprayers-1.jpg[/img] Disabled Prayers
[IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/freefestnpcdialogue.jpg[/img] Some Npc Dialogue
[IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/FreeFesttraining.jpg[/img] F2P Training Locations
[IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/FreeFesthomechurch.jpg[/img] Part of home in Entrana
[IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/FreeFestdonatorzone.jpg[/img] Donator Zone (unfinished)
[IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/FreeFestbosses-1.jpg[/img] All Bosses are Working (Delrith is deformed though, lol) [/center]
[center][size=16pt]Credits[/size][/center] [center]-Sanity (original base) -maikie61 (updated base)[/center]
Please leave some constructive criticism and/or your likes/dislikes about the server. Keep in mind this is my first project, so please don't flame. :P

item.title: FreeFest [F2P][PI] (Soon Updates Daily)
item.dc:creator: @FreeFest FreeFest
item.description:
@FreeFest wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]The tooltips displayed when you hover over a skill, such as: “Slayer”, "Current XP: ".

You can edit the client to only show, “Member’s only.”
etc.[/quote]Wow that’s a really good idea lol ;D Thanks I’ll probably do it sooner or later

Read full topic

item.title: FreeFest [F2P][PI] (Soon Updates Daily)
item.dc:creator: @FreeFest FreeFest
item.description:
@FreeFest wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Just a few ideas: instead of having messages that say it is members or not, just remove the prayers from the interface. For the skills, you could edit the client interface data to say it’s a Member’s skill. Kind of like they have on RS today.[/quote]I don’t get what you mean with the skills lol. But I might do that with the prayers later on, too lazy atm though Thanks for suggestions

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @FreeFest FreeFest
item.description:
@FreeFest wrote:

Thanks I will

Read full topic

item.title: FreeFest [F2P][PI] (Soon Updates Daily)
item.dc:creator: @killer-bros-owner Shane95
item.description:
@killer-bros-owner wrote:

Best of luck I love F2P pking so I’ll join this server if you host it and when it’s done.

If you see it failing you could always start adding new things, maybe make a “member” rank so people can use the member prayers and give them a few member items like dragon scimi, dragon armor.

Read full topic

item.title: FreeFest [F2P][PI] (Soon Updates Daily)
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

Goodluck with this.

I have known one F2P server that has been successful, but that was some time ago

Read full topic

item.title: FreeFest [F2P][PI] (Soon Updates Daily)
item.dc:creator: @FreeFest FreeFest
item.description:
@FreeFest wrote:

Hehe I plan on making things like “Gravite 2h” or “Maple Longbow(sighted)” in the Pk Point shops, instead of all of these overpowered/too overpriced “Dclaws” etc.

And about there being no bosses, there are still dungeoneering bosses that are F2P. I’ll try and get them on here, so people can still quench there thirst for boss fights.

Plus, imo I think F2P requires more skill. We’ll see if it goes far, I’ll try my best haha. And if it doesn’t, I can always release it and hope someone else can make it more succesful than I did.

Thanks for oppinions and feedback.

Read full topic

item.title: FreeFest [F2P][PI] (Soon Updates Daily)
item.dc:creator: @xxxxxx_13 xxxxxx 13
item.description:
@xxxxxx_13 wrote:

Wait…so your plan is to make a server…that does not include any of the objects/things that players look for in a server…and you expect it to go somewhere?

item.title: FreeFest [F2P][PI] (Soon Updates Daily)
item.dc:creator: @vrac_defiled vrac defiled
item.description:
@vrac_defiled wrote:

[quote=“FreeFest, post:3, topic:386085”][quote author=vrac defiled link=topic=481837.msg3528584#msg3528584 date=1299995928]
so its a F2P serv, aren’t almost all of them like that?

I never heard of a P2P private server tbh…
[/quote]It’s like free-to-play on the real Runescape. Like no members items such as dds or dclaws, no members prayers/skills, etc.[/quote]
ohhhh, so no dragon, no barrows, no bosses, no interesting teleports, no good shops…

well good luck sir and if you manage to make this successfull I will be the first to bow down before you

Read full topic
